page.title: 115 Day Educational Visit
page.content: This year{10 children}from Mr Wickes' class went on a{5 day trip}to{North {Wales.}Mrs Roberts,from school,took 3 of them in her car.Mr Wickes took the other 7 in his Landrover.11 children plus 1 teacher from Ashperton School also came in a mini_bus.We all{stayed at the{YHA centre}in{Bangor.10th June: drove 180 miles from Hope to Bangor via Betws_y_Coed & Beddgelert.{11th {June:}A day at Conwy seeing a 16th century house & The Castle.34 miles. {12th June:}from Porthmadog to Blaenau Ffestiniog on the narrow gauge railway Down the slate mines.To Harlech Castle & beach.118 miles{13th June:}A day on Anglesey.Beaumaris Castle & Town Jail. Paddling on a lovely beach.88 miles. {14th June:}Llanberis Pass,Beddgelert, Harlech to Roman Steps.On to Barmouth. Back in Hope at 7.45pm.167 miles today Total cost per child{Â£55.Good value.
